report.title: Home Study On Detection Times
report.author: Rather Not
report.bodytext: Informal home study on detection times (because I now work for a government contractor): I recently had to quit regular use of weed due to working for the communist facist's we call our government. Due to my inability to completely quit I decided to test our testers. Phase one is to determine what my personal detection times are. I have used common over the counter drug test kits available at the local drug store. What I have determined is the following: After having not smoked other than one or two hits off of a pipe on Friday night (very potent weed-did the trick) I have consistently tested clean by Sunday evening of the same weekend. So far I have performed this ritual 3 times. /n /n My next course of action is to investigate the use of synthetic urine. Since I am paranoid wondering if they can detect fake urine, I am planning on ordering a couple of samples and submitting them to legimate drug testing labs personally to see what their response is. I will post a follow-up with my results. We all need to share information to beat this nonsense being dumped on responsible pot smokers. /n /n Physical info: /n 180 lb serious mountain bike racer, triathelete... /n Approx. body fat% 10% (depending on time of year) /n Healthy (I hope) non-smoker /n Light drinker
